text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Authority" means the Canal Place Preservation and Development Authority.

"Bonds" means taxable or tax-exempt bonds, including refunding bonds, bond anticipation notes, notes in the nature of commercial paper, certificates, or any other evidence of obligation issued by the Authority.
"Fund" means the Canal Place Preservation and Development Authority Financing Fund established under § 13-1017 of this subtitle.

"Heritage Area" means the Canal Place Heritage Area, initially known as the Canal Place Historic Preservation District, the boundaries of which are described:
In the addendum of January 1993, entitled "The Canal Place Historic Preservation District", to the report of May 1992 of the Maryland State Highway Administration entitled "The Canal Parkway Development - Station Square Project"; and
In any revisions that are:
Made by the Authority under § 13-1008(8) or (10) of this subtitle; and
Approved by the Maryland Heritage Areas Authority in accordance with § 13-1111 of this title.

"Local jurisdiction" means:
Any of the 23 counties of the State;
The City of Baltimore; or
Any municipal corporation subject to the provisions of Article XI-E of the Maryland Constitution.
"Maryland Heritage Areas Authority" means the Maryland Heritage Areas Authority created under Subtitle 11 of this title.

"Park corridor" means the land area within the Heritage Area the boundaries of which are described:
In the report of May 1992 of the Maryland State Highway Administration entitled "The Canal Parkway Development - Station Square Project"; and
In any revision that the Authority makes under § 13-1008(8) of this subtitle to the report of May 1992 of the Maryland State Highway Administration entitled "The Canal Parkway Development - Station Square Project".
